description: Gives a fighter a chilling attack that slows movement speed by $1 for $2 seconds. If the target dies while chilled, it explodes, dealing $4 pure damage in a small area.
name: Glacial Touch
tooltip: Gives a fighter a chilling attack that slows movement speed by 90% for 3 seconds. If the target dies while chilled, it explodes, dealing 50 pure damage in a small area.
